phrases: July 15th (Thurs) 10:43 AM
Who is that?
I have never seen him before.
Hello.
My name is Kinoto.
I am the architect you called.
I came to estimate repairs from the fire and any renovations we might do.
Oh, right.
We made plans for you to come by.
Heaven's Door!
Sorry that was so sudden, but I have been quite cautious lately.
Yay!
I got work!
Going
To make some money!
Rohan Kishibe seems like he has a lot of money, so I am going to make a fortune.
Hopefully I can overcharge a little bit.
He was born in 1970 and is a first-class architect.
His name is Masazo Kinoto.
I see.
Looks like he is indeed the one I called.
He is not a Stand user or an enemy.
Hm?
I do not like anyone looking at my back.
I do not want anyone to see my back.
It is not like I have acne, scars, or a tattoo, but I never want anyone to look at my back, ever!
I cannot seem to get a girlfriend.
What should I do?!
I have no idea what that is about,
but I guess everyone has strange concerns and fears.
But it seems like he is safe to allow into the house.
Though there was that incident with the Janken kid, too...
Just in case, I will write in that he cannot attack me.
Huh?
Did I do something just now?
No.
Please, come in.
Let us discuss the job.
Is something the matter?
The room that caught fire is the one facing the yard.
If you do not come in, we cannot discuss what to do about it.
Oh, please, go ahead.
I will follow you.
Huh?
Now, please, go ahead.
July 15th (Thurs) 9:06 AM
Episode 32 July 15th (Thurs), Part 2
Of course I can escape, and rather easily.
You guys have not even been able to find Yoshikage Kira, have you?
You guys have not seen my face.
Does not my name seem fake, too?
I mean, it is Toyohiro Kanedaichi.
Wh-What the hell?
Are you wearing something over your face?
The fact that I thought about leaving here
means I also planned on getting away.
Well, I will be leaving now.
Y-You bastard!
Please do not come in, Josuke.
I will remain with this pylon.
What?!
What the hell are you talking about?
This all started because I found it,
and this happened because I turned into a wire
and climbed all the way up here.
I can be useful, too.
I wanted you guys to be proud of me, and that is why I did it.
Even though Okuyasu told me to stay out of it.
I got what I deserved.
Please do not worry about me.
If I think of it as if it were the inside of a spaceship,
it seems quite spacious.
You are pretty weird, but also brave.
Though it really does not matter to me who stays here.
As long as I get to leave, that is all that matters.
You guys can decide the rest for yoursel
No, you are the one who will be staying.
The only time you will ever get to hear the word goodbye
is when you hear us say it!
J-Josuke!
Y-You bastard!
Since you cut this, I was able to fix it and climb back up here.
Impossible...
Mikitaka, could you hold on for another ten seconds or so?
After I beat the crap out of this guy
and drag him back into the pylon, I will fix you right up.
Do not fall, Josuke!
Of course I will not fall.
I just said impossible, but that was wrong.
Let me rephrase that and say, you fool.
All I wanted to do was leave this pylon.
I was not planning on killing anyone...
But now I am going to have to knock you off of here
just so I can get away, you fool!
Shut up!
Shining Diamond...
It looks like a very powerful Stand when you see it up close.
But do you really think you can
lay a finger on me when I can walk around
the top of this pylon with my eyes closed?
I am guessing its range is about two meters.
Watch it!
Hey, you dumbass!
Quit fooling around!
Josuke, move away from there!
It is already been cut with the knife!
He is already cut up the pylon!
That was a dirty trick!
But it is not a speed that my Shining Diamond cannot dodge.
What are you smirking for, you bastard?
Are you that happy about me kicking your ass?!
I know every nook and cranny of this pylon.
I know exactly which angles to cut
to make the energy come flying from any direction.
Just like one who is played billiards way too much,
I know it all too well!
Billiards?
Jo...
Josuke!
You said it was not a speed that Shining Diamond cannot dodge, right?
But do you know which direction it is going to come from?
I wonder how many more shots it just fired.
They are reflecting off of the beams now.
Here they come!
Josuke!
It is coming from behind, too!
Josuke!
This is exactly why I said, you fool.
That alien or whatever over there
bravely said he would stay behind with the pylon.
You should have just listened to him.
Then you would not have to die.
B-Both of his arms?
He will not be able to dodge the next attack like that.
Here comes the energy to finish you off!
It is going right for...
By the way, Okuyasu,
did you happen to see from there how many
of this guy's attacks I smacked away with Shining Diamond?
Huh?
Yeah, I saw.
I am pretty sure I saw you smack four of them.
What?
Did you just say, by the way?
Four of them, huh?
Well, that should be enough.
Four shots should be plenty.
What are you two talking about?!
You said they were reflecting.
You said the Stand's energy was reflecting like billiard balls to attack me.
What about it, Josuke?!
My Stand is Shining Diamond.
I am sure the old man in the photograph told you,
but its power is to fix things and energies that have been destroyed.
Fix...
Did you say fix?
What are you saying you fixed?!
Are you saying that you actually had the chance to fix something just now?
You idiot!
You fixed the energies that were reflecting
and returned them to where they originated.
Josuke, I thought you were defeated,
but I guess you had already won.
I-Impossible...
It looks like the line you were supposed to say was impossible, after all.
I am really sorry.
I started living on this pylon because I disliked other people.
But the old guy in the photograph
said that if I could trap even one Stand user here,
he would look after me so I could live in the outside world,
and I ended up going along with it...
Please!
Will you let me go back to this pylon?
I never want to leave here again.
I want to stay in here forever.
I will never think about leaving the pylon ever again.
New Morioh landmark: the guy who lives on a pylon.
Morioh Landmark No. 9: The Guy Who Lives on a Pylon
He lives completely self-sufficiently,
but if you bring him salt or snacks,
he will be happy and let you take pictures with him.
He is a bit shy, so he wears a mask
and will not tell you his real name.
More importantly, about the old guy in the photograph...
Did he say anything?
Like where his son, Yoshikage Kira, might be, or anything else?
Is there a Stand user named Koichi here in Morioh?
What about Koichi?!
Listen, the old guy in the photograph just happened to randomly
mention it when he was talking.
I did not ask too much about it, and he did not go into detail.
Well, what did he say about Koichi?!
He said that he is been eliminated.
What?!
It seems the old guy in the photograph
had already found his son Yoshikage Kira's whereabouts.
He said it was not just about protecting his son anymore,
and that he was going to start attacking, as well.
And this morning, a brand new Stand user eliminated a Stand user named Koichi...
That is all he said.
July 15th (Thurs) 10:58 AM
Hmm...
This is rather...
Whoa!
Th-This door will be about 800,000 yen!
And the design is from the Victorian and Edwardian eras!
It uses materials made in England, too...
This is going to cost quite a bit.
He said he did not want anyone to see his back...
Was he acting like that on his way to my house, as well?
Here you go.
Oh, thank you.
Please, before it gets cold.
Oh, do not mind me.
July 15th (Thurs) 11:16 AM
I need to control myself...
Not yet...
Sh
Shi
Shini
Shinin
Shining
Shining D
Shining Di
Shining Dia
Shining Diamo
Shining Diamon
Shining Diamond
Jo
Josuke
Josuke Higashi
Josuke Higashikata
July 15th (Thurs) 10:20 AM
I hope they are able to find Koichi safely...
July 15th (Thurs) 11:37 AM
Damn it!
He is nowhere!
Not at home, school,
or anywhere!
Koichi!
Koichi!
Where are you, Koichi?!
I am not giving up!
I will find you, whatever it takes, Koichi!
That is what is going on.
So I was wondering if you would use your sense of smell
and tracking abilities to help me find Koichi,
Yuya Fungami.
I will fix your injuries.
This is a trade-off.
A trade-off?
You cannot be serious, Josuke!
Do not underestimate me!
You are the one who put me in this condition, and I will never forgive you!
Do you think that my pride would actually allow me to help you?
I guess it is a no, after all.
I thought it was useless to begin with.
Well, see you around.
I do not have time to waste.
Wait, huh?!
You are going to back off that easily?
W-Wait a second, hey!
Come on, haggle with me a little more.
Okay, fine!
I will help you out!
Come on, now, jeez...
If I keep acting tough,
I will just be in the hospital longer.
The only one losing out is me.
I cannot be nice to my girls with my body in this condition,
so I am getting worried and lonely lately,
thinking that they might leave me.
This all happened because I got into an accident to begin with,
so I have got nothing against you.
So hurry up and fix me up, will ya?
These injuries are killing me!
I already fixed you up using Shining Diamond.
Huh?
You know...
I really am a hot, beautiful guy.
Saying that I resemble a Michelangelo sculpture would be putting it lightly.
But you know, I think my eyes are a bit droopier than before...
Can your Stand actually fix me up 100?
Stop complaining!
More importantly, just how well does your sense of smell work?
Let us see...
I mean,
I do not want you to think of me like some hunting dog, but...
Sniff
Sniff
Sniff
For example, I can tell that three girls are walking up the hall right now.
This smell is Reiko, Akemi, and Yoshie.
They are my groupies.
And I can also tell they are coming here from the pachinko parlor.
Yu!
How are you feeling?
Ah, Yu!
Yu is out of bed!
Yo.
Are you all better, Yu?
Yu!
There, there, my cute little kittens.
You are Josuke!
What the hell are you doing here?
Looking for an ass whooping?
Hey, stop.
I have nothing against Josuke anymore.
More importantly, you guys were just playing pachinko, right?
Huh?
How did you know?
Your skirts reek of sweat around the ass.
The only reason you guys would sit on a vinyl chair
for a long time would be pachinko.
Akemi, you have chocolate?
You won at pachinko, did not you?
You are right!
You are amazing, Yu.
Here, these are for you.
As you can see,
I am the man I am because of these girls.
You fixed my injuries, so I will help you out.
You said you are not like a hunting dog?
You are more than that, Yuya Fungami!
July 15th (Thurs) 12:05 PM
What is the matter?
The floor upstairs is also burnt, right?
I will give you an estimate, so please, go ahead.
What is with him?
Why does he go to such lengths to hide his back?
What is going to happen if I see it?
I-I want to see it!
At this point, I cannot help wanting to look!
Even if it means tricking him...
Oh, it itches...
It itches...
But I cannot quite reach it.
Would it be rude if I asked someone I just met to scratch my back?
That is fine...
July 15th (Thurs) 12:38 PM
This is it.
This is where we found just Koichi's bag lying on the ground.
Koichi's house is less than two minutes away.
How did this new Stand user attack
Koichi and take him away on his way to school?
No one saw him.
Josuke...
Our deal does not include me fighting, right?
You just want me to track, right?
I do not have to fight the enemy, right, Josuke?
Why are you asking that now?
You were already being followed.
It is that man.
I smell the same scent as Koichi from that man.
He has something of Koichi's on him!
What?
That bastard over there?
Wait!
Come back here!
You bastard!
What did you do to Koichi?!
M-Mom?
Mom!
This is definitely my mom.
She is unconscious, but she is alive.
I was watching from here, but I could not tell...
When did he change into Josuke's mom?
I heard that Jotaro can stop time for two seconds,
but this is nothing like that!
Jotaro would not be able to bring in a random person from nowhere!
If he had come after me directly,
I would not have minded just knocking him out...
But that bastard went after my mom...
Guys like that are unforgivable!
Guys who play dirty tricks like this!
Yuya!
Where is he?
Where did the bastard disappear to?!
If you were touching him and do not know,
then how would I know?
B-But he is still here, Josuke...
He is nearby.
His scent has not cleared yet!
Hmm... Yuya Fungami, huh?
It is a bit surprising that his nose works that well.
Though I was fine with getting caught when I started following him, anyway.
I was planning on bringing out Josuke's mother, either way...
In order to observe Josuke.
Observe...
My Stand, Misterioso, observes.
Misterioso carefully observes Koichi Hirose and your mother, as well.
July 15th (Thurs) 7:37 AM
That kid seriously pisses me off.
I will just eat his pudding, then!
Josuke!
So you were still home.
You are here, right?
These are your panties
Everyone feels fear.
It is no use trying to hide your feelings or expressions of fear.
The fear that lies deep within one's heart
can never be erased...
No matter who you are.
Wh-Who are you?
How did you get in here?
I just figured it out now by watching you,
but you seem to have a habit of
swallowing your saliva when you are scared, do not you?
Everyone shows some kind of subconscious sign when they are scared.
A habit displayed when they are truly scared...
Have you never realized it?
I am asking you who you are!
I am not giving you any money!
Get the hell out of here!
Do I look like a burglar to you?
I do not want your money.
Actually, I would prefer to pay you.
After all, I am having so much fun right now.
I am having such fun with the attention you are giving me.
The fact that you are giving me attention out of fear, that is.
Gulp
Oh?
You swallowed again, did not you?
See?
You just swallowed again!
That is definitely the sign that you are scared!
And once the sign of your fear is discovered,
my Misterioso completes its invincible attack!
I was able to turn Tomoko Higashikata,
Tomoko Higashikata
as well as Koichi Hirose, into paper with ease!
Koichi Hirose
When I slightly startled Koichi on his way to school,
his sign of fear was blinking twice.
I could tell immediately.
Yuya, I am asking you where the scent is coming from!
No matter how tough Josuke is, I thought that he would
be scared if I brought out his mom all of a sudden, but...
Sure enough, I saw Josuke's sign.
Josuke definitely bites his lower lip when he is scared!
Ba-dump
The next time Josuke gets scared and shows that sign,
Misterioso will eliminate Josuke from this world!
Yuya, you keep looking at my mom.
Could it be...
Is it this jacket?
Is there something inside the pockets?
I do not know what kind of Stand it is, but is it in this pocket?
Oh?
Is he going to bite his lower lip?!
Come on, bite it!
Yuya, answer me!
Is he in here?!
Damn!
Looks like he is not scared yet.
Josuke, I did not promise to help you fight.
I only promised I would track.
Going any further is way too dangerous.
I accepted this deal because you fixed my injuries,
but only a fool would put himself in danger after that.
I am sorry, but that guy is too creepy!
Then I will have to see for myself.
There is nothing in there.
Both pockets are empty.
Other than this piece of paper...
The scent is no longer in the pocket...
Could it be...
Do not!
If I were you, I would not unfold that piece of paper!
